title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, some editors remain open even when changes have been saved.
EB: Closing all saved files should consistently close all open editors with saved changes, ensuring no unsaved changes are left open.
SR:
1. Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Close all currently open editors.
3. Create a new file (e.g., f1.txt).
4. Make changes to the file.
5. Save the changes.
6. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
